titles.title: Expressing heartfelt condolences and support to the people of India and all those affected in the aftermath of the deadly flash floods and landslides triggered by massive monsoons of June 2013, which devastated many states in northern India.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

bill.summary: 7/24/2013--Introduced. Mourns with the people of India for the loss of life and damage caused by the June 2013 floods and landslides. Offers condolences to the individuals and families impacted by this tragedy. Urges the U.S. government to stand with the government and the people of India during recovery and reconstruction efforts.
